FeatureProcessorManager

@Deprecated
public FeatureProcessorManager()
Deprecated. 

This constructor should not be used anymore. It contains hard-coded feature lists. Use FeatureProcessorManager(Locale) instead.

setupGenericFeatureProcessors

protected void setupGenericFeatureProcessors()

getLocale

public java.util.Locale getLocale()
Get the locale for this feature processor manager. Locale-specific subclasses must override this method to return the respective locale. This base class returns null to indicate that the feature processor manager can be used as a fallback for any locale.

Returns:

listFeatureProcessorNames

public java.lang.String listFeatureProcessorNames()
Provide a space-separated list of the feature names for all the feature processors known to this feature processor manager. The list is unsorted except that byte-valued feature processors come first, followed by short-valued feature processors, followed by continuous feature processors.

Returns:

listByteValuedFeatureProcessorNames

public java.lang.String listByteValuedFeatureProcessorNames()

setupPhoneFeatureProcessors

protected void setupPhoneFeatureProcessors(AllophoneSet phoneset,
                                           java.lang.String[] phoneValues,
                                           java.lang.String pauseSymbol,
                                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> featuresToValues)
Set up phone feature processors based on phoneset.

Parameters:
phoneset - the AllophoneSet used for the current locale.
phoneValues - optional. If null, will query phoneset.
pauseSymbol - optional. If null, will query phoneset.
featuresToValues - map listing the possible values for each feature. Optional. If null, will query phoneset.
